timeline.message:
Copyright fixes, tests for jar and module path fro MP.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: The certificate has been updated right? If so this change should not be needed.
timeline.author: romain-grecourt

timeline.bodyText: These dependency management for 4th party dependencies, they belong in helidon-dependencies
timeline.author: romain-grecourt

replies.bodyText:
These are only internal dependencies (reactive-streams-tck-flow, wagon-provider-api, hamcrest-library, weld-se-core)
I will move the others to dependencies
replies.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText: just to make sure we are on the same page: anything that manages the version of a dependency that may end-up under target/libs for an helidon app needs to be defined in helidon-dependencies.
replies.author: romain-grecourt

timeline.message:
Dependency convergence + jakarta libraries.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Copyright fixes, tests for jar and module path fro MP.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Dependency fixes to resolve javadoc issues.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Fixed the command line scripts that validate classpath and module path.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Why is this change needed for this PR ?
Should this go in a separate PR ?
timeline.author: romain-grecourt

replies.bodyText: Because this failed as part of the module-path based tests, and I needed to fix it. The build does not pass without it.
replies.author: tomas-langer
